description.value: Upon reaching 20th level, you become a master of fire. You can apply any one of the following feats to any fire spell you cast without increasing the level or casting time: @Compendium[pf1.feats.9mcYid7xJY9NiySx]{Enlarge Spell}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.btXWioB3SKJv8YEG]{Extend Spell}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{Silent Spell}, or @Compendium[pf1.feats.jVFjMIyQD6TOAsmj]{Still Spell}. You do not need to possess these feats to use this ability.
